entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 01:19 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except snow inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm except 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
